page.title: 11Housing Types in Westhill.
page.content: Westhill lies 15 kilometres west of Aberdeen.{Aberdeen city}has grown so much in recent years because of the {oil industry.}This has meant a large number of people looking for housing. As a result Westhill has grown from 56 people in 1954 to 8,500 in 1985. There are 8 main{property developers } in Westhill.These are;WIMPEY,CALA, HEADLAND,ASHDALE,L&C,STEWART MILNE, KILDONNAN and GORDON DISTRICT COUNCIL. By 1985 these developers have built nearly 1,000 new houses in Westhill. Most of these houses have been built for{PRIVATE OWNERSHIP}and range from luxury 5 bedroomed villas to small 1 bedroom apartments.In Westhill, prices range from Â£26,500 to over Â£100,000 for the most luxurious homes. This makes Westhill one of the most expensive suburbs of Aberdeen. There are detached and semi-detached here.
